org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.context

Class ContextRepresenters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.context.ContextRepresenters

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class ContextRepresenters
extends Object
    Driver-Side representation of all contexts on an Evaluator.
